review:
this is one of the best comedy movies i've ever gone through in my life. 
despite the movie running for almost 3 hours, i bet, you won't be bored for a second. 
this movie is there to be in that evergreen genre. 
watched it after 12 years of release and i am like, where the hell have i been, all those years?
one of my favourite movies.good story based on men having extra marital affairs but at the end get devoted to their wives.all the actors work is good
this is  an awesome movie  that i have ever seen. i really love salman and his role 😍😘 and this one of the best movie 👌👌👌✌️👍👍👍👍👍😍😘  😉

i was in depression and no entry movie was running on tv and it wholly changed my mood. it was best comedy movie of all time💓💓💓💓 and anees bazmi - the
best director after late priyadarshan sir💓💓
best hindi comedy movie ever what a script.. superb... dont miss it.. remaked into malayalam as happy husbands
one of my favourite movie..can  watch this film infinite tyms... its so entertaining.💚💚💚💚💚.. hats off to all the cast n director of this film
really awesome comic movie & fun full drama.
i love this moovi very funny
bakwas movie.. it's a sex riot.
